mathematics

Class VectorCalculus

  • java.lang.Object
    • mathematics.VectorCalculus

  • public class VectorCalculus
extends java.lang.Object
    Static library with useful functions from the discrete calculus of vector fields.
    Author:
    Tristan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VectorCalculus() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Vector[][][] fourPointFiniteDifferenceMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
      Classical Perona-Malik style four-directional finite differences Returns 4 vectors per point in the image: the N,S,E,W finite differences.
      static ImageTTAA generateGradientMagnitudeImage(ImageTTAA t)
      Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as an image.
      static LayeredMatrix generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix(ImageTTAA t)
      Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as a layered matrix (image).
      static LayeredMatrix generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
      Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as a layered matrix (image).
      static Vector[][][] gradientMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
      Computes the gradient vector field over the input image tensor (vector field) Per point, returns {dx,dy}, where da is 3-vector per rgb component, per direction.
      static LayeredMatrix[][] hessianMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
      Returns the Hessian matrix at every point in the image.
      static LayeredMatrix laplacianMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
      Computes the laplacian at each point in the image matrix, returning it as an image matrix.
      static LayeredMatrix sobelGradientMagnitude(LayeredMatrix m)
      Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as an image, based on Sobel gradient matrix kernel convolution.

    • Method Detail

      • gradientMatrix

        public static Vector[][][] gradientMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
        Computes the gradient vector field over the input image tensor (vector field) Per point, returns {dx,dy}, where da is 3-vector per rgb component, per direction. Uses the fourth-order central differnce, except in edge cases where the first order centered and/or single-sided finite difference is used.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • fourPointFiniteDifferenceMatrix

        public static Vector[][][] fourPointFiniteDifferenceMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
        Classical Perona-Malik style four-directional finite differences Returns 4 vectors per point in the image: the N,S,E,W finite differences.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • laplacianMatrix

        public static LayeredMatrix laplacianMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
        Computes the laplacian at each point in the image matrix, returning it as an image matrix.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix

        public static LayeredMatrix generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix(ImageTTAA t)
        Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as a layered matrix (image). Uses the fourth-order central differnce, except in edge cases where the first order centered and/or single-sided finite difference is used.
        Parameters:
        t -
        Returns:

      • generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix

        public static LayeredMatrix generateGradientMagnitudeLayeredMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
        Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as a layered matrix (image). Uses the fourth-order central differnce, except in edge cases where the first order centered and/or single-sided finite difference is used.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • generateGradientMagnitudeImage

        public static ImageTTAA generateGradientMagnitudeImage(ImageTTAA t)
        Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as an image. Uses the fourth-order central differnce, except in edge cases where the first order centered and/or single-sided finite difference is used.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • hessianMatrix

        public static LayeredMatrix[][] hessianMatrix(LayeredMatrix m)
        Returns the Hessian matrix at every point in the image. Each return value is a 2x2x3 matrix (e.g. dxx(x,y) for red or dyx(x,y) for green). For example, H.at(0,1,0)[i][j] is dxy_red(i,j).
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:

      • sobelGradientMagnitude

        public static LayeredMatrix sobelGradientMagnitude(LayeredMatrix m)
                                            throws InvalidRequestException
        Returns the magnitude of the gradient of the image as an image, based on Sobel gradient matrix kernel convolution.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException
